strings.GADGET_DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to use an autoscrolling div element
strings.GADGET_ABOUT_TEXT:
Scrolling Div Demo Copyright © 2007 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved Demonstrates an autoscrolling div.
Contains an image created by Irene Tong: http://www.flickr.com/photos/irenetong/243426908/ Made available under Creative Commons Attribution-NoDerivs 2.0 License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nd/2.0/deed.en-us
strings.DOCKED_LABEL: No scroll bar is visible when this gadget is docked.
strings.UNDOCKED_LABEL: A red div contains a yellow, autoscrolling div that contains an image. Try resizing!
